DOC.brief_summary: This is a feasibility study to demonstrate the team's ability to collect bone marrow aspirates and biopsies for research purposes from women with metastatic breast cancer.
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study of Bone Biopsy and Aspirate in Women With Metastatic Breast Cancer
DOC.criteria: Patients with metastatic breast cancer (any site) age 21 or older Patients willing and able to provide informed consent & perform study procedures Patients may enroll with recently (with 2 months) progressive tumor burden Performance status of 0,1 or 2 Patients unable or unwilling to provide informed consent and or perform study procedures Patients with active, uncontrolled coagulopathy Patients on treatment dose anticoagulation or an International Normalised Ratio of 2 or greater if on warfarin Patients who are known to be pregnant are not eligible to participate in this study during the time of the pregnancy
